column4: Tourism;Kampong Chhnang:------ At 1:30 pm on Saturday
column7: there was a case of a ferry sinking east of the sandbank off Kandal village
column9: Kampong Chhnang Province.------The boat (Mekong-Don) has a size of 20
column12: 7  metres. 55 employees  work on the vessel.------The boat had stopped for the night
column13: when it began to take on water and sink.------The reason was given was due to damage to the bilge pumps. Nobody was injured in the incident.------Post News
